t: Using the Deep Learning Base AMI - AWS Deep Learning AMIs
s: The Base AMI comes with a foundational platform of GPU drivers and acceleration libraries to deploy your own customized deep learning environment. By default the AMI is configured with any one NVIDIA CUDA version environment. You can also switch between different versions of CUDA.
